attributes.action: Ban the sale and use of fireworks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fireworks are anti social and cause uneccessary distress to humans as well as to animals.
Every year the unacceptable level of noise created by fireworks seems to increase. 
Any celebration e.g. Birthdays, Christmas, New Year, seems to be the signal for all hell to break out.
People set fireworks off in small gardens which border on their neighbours gardens which disturbs and upsets others for long periods of time.  Pets are terrified and anxious which also causes distress for their owners. children are unable to sleep because of the noise.
Enough is enough.  
Every year people are injured some seriously in the name of fun.  Isn't it time to call a halt in the interests of safety, peace and quiet and that old fashioned concept - consideration for others.
